name: SEO: Study the current informational demand
description:
Import the search queries related to your keyword combinations to understand what people are searching for. Identify the main topics, keywords and gaps, generate content ideas that bridge those gaps.

This template was created by a 3rd party and has not been tested by Make. For support and other questions, please reach out to info@noduslabs.com or https://support.noduslabs.com
